divs: Sighting DetailsI was awakened by my alarm clock. I get up and start to get my things ready to go to court. i jump in the shower and i looked outside the window to see if it was raining since it was cloudy. Thats when i noticed a black oval looking object. I thought it might have been a trash bag, but it seemed to big to be a bag. I kept on looking at it trying to figure out what it could be. It moved from left to right then it started going towards the mountains. I was very excited to witness this since i've witnessed other things in the sky in the past. I kept on looking at the object and i started to loose sight of it as it kept going farther. I got out the shower and told my girlfriend about it. Then i drew it on a dry erase board. i turned on the news and started watching them. I saw a story about a police helicopter that had to make an emergency stop because the emergency lights went off. i thought it might have been coincidental since i've heard that whenever theres UFOS near they mess up their equipment. Today(march, 8, 2011) I was watching the news and I saw a report at Redondo Beach about millions of dead anchovies. Now I wonder if it could in fact have been a UFO or something else. Hopefully there's someone else out there that saw it too,(in pomona or around pomona).
